name: Gravity Knight
description:
Gravity Knight
A,D keys for the movement.
You can change the gravity of the knight with the "W" Key.
Jump is on the Spacebar
Pause and Mute Option with "Esc" Key
For the best experience play the game in fullscreen mode

This game was made by my girlfriend Em4n0n and me during the My First Game Jam: Summer 2020
Devlog can be found here Gravity Knight Devlog
